data.title: In the Presence of Mine Enemies – DebbieViguie.com
data.text:
Description

Psalm 23 Mysteries

Book 15

Jeremiah has worked really hard to put his past behind him. His carefully built house of cards all begins to tumble down, though, when he’s accused of murder. Complicating things is the fact that enemies of his past have found him and are determined to destroy him for good. Everyone he loves is a target and he must do everything in his power to protect them and put his own demons to rest before someone else he knows is killed.

More Psalm 23 Books Paperback Version

Additional information

Book Types

Ebook, Kindle, Paperback

E-book Formats

Kindle/Nook/Kobo, Mobi, PDF

Category Christian, Mystery, Psalm 23 Mysteries, Series, Thriller Tags Psalm 23 Mysteries SKU B07DCYZR1R

This series has it all. Intrigue, love, salvation, reconciliation, mystery, friends who are family and family who are friends, adventure, heart-pounding suspense, tears (happy and sad), and a desire for more. Thank God for the creativity, strength, ideas, and special abilities He has blessed Debbie Viguié with, so that she could share it all with us.
